Title: Carilion Clinic develops strong patient-clinician bonds with DAX Copilot
Author: Microsoft Cloud
Description:
DAX Copilot has drastically improved patient engagement at Carilion Clinic by freeing clinicians from notetaking and enhancing focus on care. With flexible documentation and adaptive capabilities, it streamlines documentation with a human touch. DAX Copilot is a clinical artificial intelligence-powered listening solution that is now part of Microsoft Dragon Copilot.

Read more: https://msft.it/6053So109

#Microsoft
